title: Bhakti Buffet
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, International, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar
description: The Bhakti Center in NYC has operated various food services over the years. In 2015 it opened this vegetarian dining place with roots in bhakti or devotion. Lunch bar offers soup, salad, and sandwiches. Dinner is full meals. MAY 2016 REPORTED NO LONGER SERVING MEAT - PLEASE CONFIRM.
